name: Modular and Modula
description:
This is a prototype. It is about the atmosphere and elements of gameplay, and not (yet) a full playable game. More mechanics would be added if we decide to continue.

Modular and Modula are two different characters who merge into one. You can swap between Modular and Modulas head, rump, legs at any point. Their body-parts change how the character moves, use their differences to your advantage.

Use WASD to move, swap legs with Q and rump with E, attack with F.

Made by Luca Egloff and Abe Wits (in 6 days) for the GJL Game Parade spring 2021.
